name: Reston Dog Spotter VR
description:
Put on your Google Cardboard VR headset with your Android device and experience a leisurely stroll around Reston's scenic Lake Audubon. See how many dogs you can find as you make your way along the path. Can you find them all before you reach the end? Make sure that you look all around, they may be in front or behind you, since this is VR after all!

This project was made as a part of GAME399 at George Mason University.
